2001: A Space Odyssey (1968)
challenge_days.info: The greatest film ever made began with the meeting of two brilliant minds: Stanley Kubrick and sci-fi seer Arthur C. Clarke.

challenge_days.title: The Godfather (1972)
challenge_days.info: From the wise guys of Goodfellas to The Sopranos, all crime dynasties that came after The Godfather are descendants of the Corleones.

challenge_days.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
challenge_days.info: Steven Spielberg’s funnest blockbuster has it all: rolling boulders, a treacherous monkey, a champagne-drinking villan.

challenge_days.title: Goodfellas (1990)
challenge_days.info: The romance of the mob lifestyle—the food, the nightclubs, the cheating, the violence—made for a glittering surface.

challenge_days.title: Mulholland Drive (2001)
challenge_days.info: David Lynch’s glamorous nightmare of Los Angeles is dense with mystery, terror and uncanny sexiness.
